metadata.title: CVE-2014-3525 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: Unspecified vulnerability in Apache Traffic Server 3.x through 3.2.5, 4.xbefore 4.2.1.1, and 5.x before 5.0.1 has unknown impact and attack vectors,possibly related to health checks.

criterions.comment: trafficserver: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
